trans-unit.source: Identifies a data operation method exposed by a type, what type of operation the method performs, and whether the method is the default data method.
trans-unit.target: 識別型別所公開的資料作業方法、方法所執行的作業型別，以及方法是否為預設資料方法。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別無法被繼承。

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.ComponentModel.DataObjectMethodAttribute> to identify data operation methods on a type marked with the <xref:System.ComponentModel.DataObjectAttribute> attribute so that they are more easily identified by callers using reflection.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用<xref:System.ComponentModel.DataObjectMethodAttribute>來識別資料作業方法，以標記的型別上<xref:System.ComponentModel.DataObjectAttribute>屬性，讓它們更容易識別的呼叫端使用反映。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.ComponentModel.DataObjectMethodAttribute> attribute is applied to a method, it describes the type of operation the method performs and indicates whether the method is the default data operation method of a type.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.ComponentModel.DataObjectMethodAttribute>屬性套用至方法，它描述的作業，方法會執行，並指出方法是否為預設資料作業方法的型別類型。

trans-unit.source: Components such as the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control and the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner> class examine the values of this attribute, if present, to help determine which data method to call at run time.
trans-unit.target: 這類元件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>控制項和<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner>類別檢查這個屬性的值，如果有的話，以協助您判斷資料来呼叫的方法在執行階段。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how you can apply the <xref:System.ComponentModel.DataObjectMethodAttribute> attribute to a publicly exposed method and identify the type of data operation it performs as well as whether it is the type's default data method.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何套用<xref:System.ComponentModel.DataObjectMethodAttribute>屬性公開的方法，並識別資料作業，它會執行，以及它是類型的預設資料方法的類型。

trans-unit.source: In this example the `NorthwindData` type exposes two data methods: one to retrieve a set of data named `GetAllEmployees`, and another to delete data named `DeleteEmployeeByID`.
trans-unit.target: 在此範例中`NorthwindData`型別會公開兩種資料方法： 一個擷取名為資料的一組`GetAllEmployees`，而另一個刪除名為資料`DeleteEmployeeByID`。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.DataObjectMethodAttribute> attribute is applied to both methods, the `GetAllEmployees` method is marked as the default method for the Select data operation, and the `DeleteEmployeeByID` method is marked as the default method for the Delete data operation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.DataObjectMethodAttribute>屬性會套用至這兩種方法，`GetAllEmployees`方法標示為預設選取的資料作業方法，而`DeleteEmployeeByID`方法標示為刪除的資料作業的預設方法。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.DataObjectMethodAttribute" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.DataObjectMethodAttribute" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.DataObjectMethodType" /> values that describes the data operation the method performs.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.DataObjectMethodType" /> 值，描述方法所執行的資料作業。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.DataObjectMethodAttribute" /> class and identifies the type of data operation the method performs.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.DataObjectMethodAttribute" /> 類別的新執行個體，並識別方法所執行的資料作業類型。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.DataObjectMethodAttribute.IsDefault%2A> property is set to `false` when you create a <xref:System.ComponentModel.DataObjectMethodAttribute> object using this <xref:System.ComponentModel.DataObjectMethodAttribute.%23ctor%28System.ComponentModel.DataObjectMethodType%29> constructor.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.DataObjectMethodAttribute.IsDefault%2A>屬性設定為`false`當您建立<xref:System.ComponentModel.DataObjectMethodAttribute>物件使用這<xref:System.ComponentModel.DataObjectMethodAttribute.%23ctor%28System.ComponentModel.DataObjectMethodType%29>建構函式。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how you can apply the <xref:System.ComponentModel.DataObjectMethodAttribute> attribute to a publicly exposed method and identify the type of data operation it performs as well as whether it is the type's default data method.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何套用<xref:System.ComponentModel.DataObjectMethodAttribute>屬性公開的方法，並識別資料作業，它會執行，以及它是類型的預設資料方法的類型。

trans-unit.source: In this example the `NorthwindData` type exposes two data methods: one to retrieve a set of data named `GetAllEmployees`, and another to delete data named `DeleteEmployeeByID`.
trans-unit.target: 在此範例中`NorthwindData`型別會公開兩種資料方法： 一個擷取名為資料的一組`GetAllEmployees`，而另一個刪除名為資料`DeleteEmployeeByID`。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.DataObjectMethodAttribute> attribute is applied to both methods, the `GetAllEmployees` method is marked as the default method for the Select data operation, and the `DeleteEmployeeByID` method is marked as the default method for the Delete data operation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.DataObjectMethodAttribute>屬性會套用至這兩種方法，`GetAllEmployees`方法標示為預設選取的資料作業方法，而`DeleteEmployeeByID`方法標示為刪除的資料作業的預設方法。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.DataObjectMethodType" /> values that describes the data operation the method performs.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.DataObjectMethodType" /> 值，描述方法所執行的資料作業。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to indicate the method that the attribute is applied to is the default method of the data object for the specified <c>methodType</c>; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示已套用屬性的方法是資料物件為指定之 <c>methodType</c> 的預設方法，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.DataObjectMethodAttribute" /> class, identifies the type of data operation the method performs, and identifies whether the method is the default data method that the data object exposes.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.DataObjectMethodAttribute" /> 類別的新執行個體、識別方法所執行的資料作業類型，並識別方法是否為資料物件所公開的預設資料方法。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how you can apply the <xref:System.ComponentModel.DataObjectMethodAttribute> attribute to a publicly exposed method and identify the type of data operation it performs as well as whether it is the type's default data method.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何套用<xref:System.ComponentModel.DataObjectMethodAttribute>屬性公開的方法，並識別資料作業，它會執行，以及它是類型的預設資料方法的類型。

trans-unit.source: In this example the `NorthwindData` type exposes two data methods: one to retrieve a set of data named `GetAllEmployees`, and another to delete data named `DeleteEmployeeByID`.
trans-unit.target: 在此範例中`NorthwindData`型別會公開兩種資料方法： 一個擷取名為資料的一組`GetAllEmployees`，而另一個刪除名為資料`DeleteEmployeeByID`。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.DataObjectMethodAttribute> attribute is applied to both methods, the `GetAllEmployees` method is marked as the default method for the Select data operation, and the `DeleteEmployeeByID` method is marked as the default method for the Delete data operation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.DataObjectMethodAttribute>屬性會套用至這兩種方法，`GetAllEmployees`方法標示為預設選取的資料作業方法，而`DeleteEmployeeByID`方法標示為刪除的資料作業的預設方法。

trans-unit.source: An object to compare with this instance of <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.DataObjectMethodAttribute" />.
trans-unit.target: 與這個 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.DataObjectMethodAttribute" /> 執行個體相互比較的物件。

trans-unit.source: Returns a value indicating whether this instance is equal to a specified object.
trans-unit.target: 傳回值，指出這個執行個體 (Instance) 是否和指定的物件相等。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if this instance is the same as the instance specified by the <paramref name="obj" /> parameter; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果這個執行個體與 <paramref name="obj" /> 參數所指定的執行個體相同，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This method determines whether this <xref:System.ComponentModel.DataObjectMethodAttribute> fits the pattern of another object.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會判斷是否這<xref:System.ComponentModel.DataObjectMethodAttribute>符合另一個物件的模式。

trans-unit.source: Returns the hash code for this instance.
trans-unit.target: 傳回這個執行個體的雜湊碼。

trans-unit.source: A 32-bit signed integer hash code.
trans-unit.target: 32 位元帶正負號的整數雜湊碼。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the method that the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.DataObjectMethodAttribute" /> is applied to is the default data method exposed by the data object for a specific method type.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出套用 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.DataObjectMethodAttribute" /> 的方法是否為資料物件針對指定的方法型別所公開的預設資料方法。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the method is the default method exposed by the object for a method type; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果方法是物件為方法型別所公開的預設方法，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control uses the <xref:System.ComponentModel.DataObjectMethodAttribute.IsDefault%2A> property to distinguish between multiple methods that match the signature requirements for a specific method type.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>控制使用<xref:System.ComponentModel.DataObjectMethodAttribute.IsDefault%2A>屬性來區別多個符合特定的方法類型的簽章需求的方法。

trans-unit.source: If two methods match the signature requirements, the method with the <xref:System.ComponentModel.DataObjectMethodAttribute.IsDefault%2A> property set to `true` is selected.
trans-unit.target: 如果兩個方法符合簽章需求，則使用的方法<xref:System.ComponentModel.DataObjectMethodAttribute.IsDefault%2A>屬性設定為`true`已選取。

trans-unit.source: At design-time the <xref:System.ComponentModel.DataObjectMethodAttribute.IsDefault%2A> property is used to automatically set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.SelectMethod%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.UpdateMethod%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.DeleteMethod%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.InsertMethod%2A> properties on an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> instance.
trans-unit.target: 在設計階段<xref:System.ComponentModel.DataObjectMethodAttribute.IsDefault%2A>屬性用來自動設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.SelectMethod%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.UpdateMethod%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.DeleteMethod%2A>，和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.InsertMethod%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>執行個體。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.ComponentModel.DataObjectMethodAttribute> is created using the <xref:System.ComponentModel.DataObjectMethodAttribute.%23ctor%28System.ComponentModel.DataObjectMethodType%29> constructor that only takes a <xref:System.ComponentModel.DataObjectMethodType> parameter, the <xref:System.ComponentModel.DataObjectMethodAttribute.IsDefault%2A> property is set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.ComponentModel.DataObjectMethodAttribute>使用建立<xref:System.ComponentModel.DataObjectMethodAttribute.%23ctor%28System.ComponentModel.DataObjectMethodType%29>建構函式只採用<xref:System.ComponentModel.DataObjectMethodType>參數，<xref:System.ComponentModel.DataObjectMethodAttribute.IsDefault%2A>屬性設定為`false`。

trans-unit.source: An object to compare with this instance of <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.DataObjectMethodAttribute" />.
trans-unit.target: 與這個 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.DataObjectMethodAttribute" /> 執行個體相互比較的物件。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether this instance shares a common pattern with a specified attribute.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出這個執行個體是否與指定的屬性共用通用模式。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if this instance is the same as the instance specified by the <paramref name="obj" /> parameter; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果這個執行個體與 <paramref name="obj" /> 參數所指定的執行個體相同，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This method determines whether one <xref:System.ComponentModel.DataObjectMethodAttribute> fits the pattern of another.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會判斷某個<xref:System.ComponentModel.DataObjectMethodAttribute>符合另一個模式。

trans-unit.source: Its implementation is not the same as that of <xref:System.ComponentModel.DataObjectMethodAttribute.Equals%2A>, however, because it does not test for true equality.
trans-unit.target: 它的實作不屬於相同<xref:System.ComponentModel.DataObjectMethodAttribute.Equals%2A>，不過，因為它不會測試是否相等，則為 true。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.DataObjectMethodType" /> value indicating the type of data operation the method performs.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.DataObjectMethodType" /> 值，表示方法所執行的資料作業類型。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.DataObjectMethodType" /> values that identifies the type of data operation performed by the method to which the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.DataObjectMethodAttribute" /> is applied.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.DataObjectMethodType" /> 值，識別已套用 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.DataObjectMethodAttribute" /> 的方法所執行的資料作業類型。
